hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Prophet (ﷺ) abominated the combination of paternal and maternal aunts and the combination of two maternal aunts and two paternal aunts in marriage

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ أَنْ يُجْمَعَ بَيْنَهُنَّ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Women Whom It Is Disliked To Combine Between (In Marriage)
